title: Pulling Strings feat. Bashir Salahuddin
dc:creator: WBUR
description: Bashir Salahuddin (Top Gun: Maverick, South Side) stars in a Ghanaian tale about legendary eight-legged trickster Anansi, and why all spiders have narrow waists.
